Name: Pina Colada Cocktail (Puerto Rican style)
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
20 ml Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Pineapple shell (frozen) glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge and Luxardo Maraschino Cherry speared with a parasol.
BLEND all ingredients with 7oz scoop of crushed ice.
Garnish with parasol speared pineapple wedge and maraschino cherry.
Review: A wonderful creamy, fruity concoction that's not half as sticky as the world would have you believe. Too much ice will detract from the creaminess and kill the drink.
Nutrition: One serving of Pina Colada Cocktail (Puerto Rican style) contains 215 calories
